channel.title: Help with npc
channel.description: im trying to add an npc to modroom i edited the npcloc.xml file and saved and compiled but hes not showing up when i restart the server..is there another file im supposed to edit as well?

item.title: Help with npc
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“adu, post:6, topic:240381”][quote author=KO9 link=topic=316696.msg2515022#msg2515022 date=1225531311]

did you compress the npcloc.xml into a npcloc.xml.gz file?

BTW- You only need to compile when you make a .java file not a .xml file, hence the name javac. JAVA COMPILER

Lol, i guess. I actully make java files not edit them so i use javac almost all the time.

ugh, he’ll undoubtedly be using apache-ant (yes I know it still uses javac…)
[/quote][/quote]Apache-ANT is more of a build manager that makes things easier to compile/run.

Read full topic

BTW- You only need to compile when you make a .java file not a .xml file, hence the name javac. JAVA COMPILER
[/quote]

ugh, he’ll undoubtedly be using apache-ant (yes I know it still uses javac…)[/quote]
